raw.title: RealView Developer Kit Assembler Guide
raw.content_description: This book provides tutorial and reference information for the RealView Developer Kit (RVDK) assemblers (armasm, the free-standing assembler, and inline assemblers in the C and C++ compilers). It describes the command-line options to the assembler, the assembly language mnemonics, the pseudo-instructions, the macros, and directives available to assembly language programmers, and the ARM, Thumb-2, Thumb, and Vector Floating-point (VFP) instruction sets.
